PartyIdentityVerification.name: PartyIdentityVerification
PartyIdentityVerification.description: Represents information about the identity verification checks done for a party.

IsResultOverridden.description: Indicates whether the party identity verification result was overridden.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the party identity verification record.

OverriddenById.description: The record of the user who is responsible for overriding the party identity verification result.

OverriddenResult.description: Specifies the overridden result for a party after the party identity verification is complete.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the record owner.

PartyProfileId.description: The party profile that's associated with the third-party identity verification.

ReportUrl.description: The URL of the report provided by the third-party identity verification agency.

RequestCompletionDate.description: The date when the party identity verification request was completed.

Result.description: Specifies the result of the party identity verification.

ResultOverrideComment.description: The description about the party identity verification.

ResultOverrideReason.description: Specifies the reason for overriding the party identity verification request.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the party identity verification request.

ThirdPartyVerfProcIdentifier.description: The ID of verification run in the third-party verification system.

ThirdPartyVerfdentifier.description: The ID of the identity verification record in the third-party identity verification system.

ThirdPartyVerificationRunUrl.description: The third-party URL to view details of the verification run on the party profile.

VerificationRequestDate.description: The date when the party identity verification request was submitted.

VerifiedBy.description: The name of the third-party that conducted the identity verification.
